oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-11-26 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 26, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ferlin Husky; Rod Brasfield; Louvin Brothers; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ferlin Husky -- I'll Baby Sit With You (Ferlin Husky) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Ferlin Husky) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces the Louvin Brothers -- I Don't Believe You've Met My Baby (Louvin Brothers) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Soldier's Joy -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Saith The Lord (Ferlin Husky) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Prince Albert jingle (Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Del Wood -- Smoky Mountain Polka (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Husky, Ferlin; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011
